articles.author: By Noah Feit nfeit@thestate.com
articles.title: He led police on long chase. When tires fell off, he said he was running from cartel, SC cops say
articles.description: A South Carolina man led police on high-speed chase from Spartanburg County to York County because he was afraid he was going to be killed by a Mexican drug cartel, according to the Spartanburg County Sheriff's Office.
